steps.description: The player hears whispers of a haunted bridge that inspires dread in travelers.
Investigate the old stone bridge where local legends speak of betrayal from the past.
Discover that the bridge was the site of a historic betrayal, marked by eerie omens.
Confront the echo of the betrayed spirit who warns of a repeating cycle.
Meet a disoriented pilgrim who claims they are drawn to a shrine corrupted by darkness.
Escort the pilgrim through perilous terrain towards the corrupted shrine.
At the shrine, witness a failed purification ritual that opens a void tear.
Use ancient techniques to cleanse the shrine and seal the void tear.
The player hears that restless spirits haunt the nearby ruins, demanding justice.
Explore the ruins, uncovering signs of a ritual that went disastrously wrong.
Reveal the truth of a revenant born from a botched ritual, seeking rest.
Unravel the trapped truth within the void tear to lay the revenant to rest.
